title: Force on object due to current in wire

content.question: An object with charge -q is in motion near a wire that has a current I to the right. At the instant shown in the figure above, the object is traveling to the right with speed v. Both the wire and the motion of the object are in the plane of the page. Which of the following statements is true about the force on the object due to the current I at the instant shown?

choices.label: The force is directed toward the top of the page.
The force is directed toward the bottom of the page.
The force is directed toward the right.
There is no force on the object due to the current.

content.answer: The force is directed toward the bottom of the page.
